import os
import json
from datetime import datetime

HISTORY_FILE = "./memory/structure_fixes_history.json"

def log_structure_fix_result(result: dict, dry_run: bool):
    entry = {
        "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat(),
        "dry_run": dry_run,
        "result": result,
    }

    if not os.path.exists(HISTORY_FILE):
        with open(HISTORY_FILE, "w") as f:
            json.dump([entry], f, indent=2)
    else:
        with open(HISTORY_FILE, "r+") as f:
            data = json.load(f)
            data.append(entry)
            f.seek(0)
            json.dump(data, f, indent=2)
```

# ğŸ“ app/utils/structure_fix_applier.py

import os
import shutil
from datetime import datetime
import json

REPORT_PATH = "./backend/data/structure_report.json"

def apply_structure_fixes(dry_run=True):
    result = {
        "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat(),
        "fixed_files": [],
        "skipped": [],
        "warnings": [],
        "backup_path": "",
        "dry_run": dry_run,
    }

    # âœ… ë¦¬í¬íŠ¸ ë¡œë“œ
    if not os.path.exists(REPORT_PATH):
        result["warnings"].append(f"âŒ êµ¬ì¡° ë¦¬í¬íŠ¸ ì—†ìŒ: {REPORT_PATH}")
        return result

    with open(REPORT_PATH, "r") as f:
        report = json.load(f)

    proposals = report.get("structure_proposals", [])
    if not proposals:
        result["warnings"].append("âœ… ì ìš©í•  ì œì•ˆ ì—†ìŒ.")
        return result

    # âœ… ë°±ì—… ë””ë ‰í† ë¦¬ ìƒì„±
    timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
    backup_path = f"./memory/structure_fixes_backup/{timestamp}/"
    os.makedirs(backup_path, exist_ok=True)
    result["backup_path"] = backup_path

    # âœ… ì œì•ˆ í•˜ë‚˜ì”© ì ìš© (ì˜ˆ: ì¤‘ë³µ íŒŒì¼ ì œê±°, ì—°ê²° ì•ˆëœ ë¡œê·¸ ì´ë™ ë“±)
    for proposal in proposals:
        if "âŒ ì¤‘ë³µ íŒŒì¼:" in proposal and "â†’ ìœ ì§€:" in proposal:
            lines = proposal.split("â†’ ìœ ì§€:")
            files = lines[0].replace("âŒ ì¤‘ë³µ íŒŒì¼:", "").strip().split(", ")
            keep = lines[1].strip()

            for f in files:
                if f != keep and os.path.exists(f):
                    if dry_run:
                        result["fixed_files"].append(f"[DRY] ì‚­ì œ ì˜ˆì •: {f}")
                    else:
                        shutil.move(f, os.path.join(backup_path, os.path.basename(f)))
                        result["fixed_files"].append(f"ğŸ“¦ ì´ë™: {f}")

        elif "ğŸ”— ì—°ê²°ë˜ì§€ ì•ŠìŒ:" in proposal:
            target = proposal.replace("ğŸ”— ì—°ê²°ë˜ì§€ ì•ŠìŒ:", "").strip()
            if os.path.exists(target):
                dest = f"./memory/unlinked/"
                os.makedirs(dest, exist_ok=True)
                if dry_run:
                    result["fixed_files"].append(f"[DRY] ì´ë™ ì˜ˆì •: {target}")
                else:
                    shutil.move(target, os.path.join(dest, os.path.basename(target)))
                    result["fixed_files"].append(f"ğŸ“¦ ë¯¸ì—°ê²° ì´ë™: {target}")

        else:
            result["skipped"].append(proposal)

    return result
```

def backup_path_for(file_path: str) -> str:

def move_to_backup(file_path: str):

def apply_duplicate_file_fixes(duplicates: list, dry_run: bool) -> list:
    results = []

    for file_entry in duplicates:

                else:

                item_result["removed"].append(dup)

def apply_unlinked_file_fixes(unlinked: list, dry_run: bool) -> list:
    results = []
    print("\nğŸ“ ì—°ê²°ë˜ì§€ ì•Šì€ íŒŒì¼ ì •ë¦¬ ì‹œì‘...")
    for file_entry in unlinked:
        for filename, paths in file_entry.items():
            for path in paths:
                if not os.path.exists(path):
                    print(f"  âš ï¸ ê²½ë¡œ ì—†ìŒ (ìŠ¤í‚µ): {path}")
                    continue
                dest = os.path.join(UNLINKED_DIR, filename)
                if dry_run:
                    print(f"  [DRY-RUN] ì´ë™ ì˜ˆì •: {path} â†’ {dest}")
                else:
                    os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(dest), exist_ok=True)
                    shutil.move(path, dest)
                    print(f"  âœ… ì´ë™ ì™„ë£Œ: {path} â†’ {dest}")
                results.append({"source": path, "dest": dest})
    return results

# âœ… ë°±ì—”ë“œ-í”„ë¡ íŠ¸ ë¯¸ì—°ê²° ê²½ê³ 
def warn_only_backend_frontend_mismatch(warnings: list):
    print("\nâš ï¸ ë°±ì—”ë“œ-í”„ë¡ íŠ¸ ë¯¸ì—°ê²° í•­ëª©:")
    for msg in warnings:
        print("  -", msg)
    return warnings

# âœ… FastAPIì—ì„œ í˜¸ì¶œ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ í•¨ìˆ˜
def apply_structure_fixes(dry_run: bool = False) -> dict:
    report = load_structure_report(REPORT_PATH)
    print("ğŸ“Š ê¸ˆê°• êµ¬ì¡° ë¦¬í¬íŠ¸ ìë™ ê°œì„  ì‹œì‘ (dry_run = {})".format(dry_run))

    dup_result = apply_duplicate_file_fixes(report.get("duplicate_files", []), dry_run)
    unlinked_result = apply_unlinked_file_fixes(report.get("unlinked_files", []), dry_run)
    warnings = warn_only_backend_frontend_mismatch(report.get("backend_frontend_mismatch", []))

    print("\nğŸ êµ¬ì¡° ìë™ ì •ë¦¬ ì™„ë£Œ.")

    return {
        "status": "success",
        "message": "êµ¬ì¡° ìë™ ì •ë¦¬ ì™„ë£Œ",
        "dry_run": dry_run,
        "duplicate_fix_result": dup_result,
        "unlinked_fix_result": unlinked_result,
        "warnings": warnings
    }

# âœ… CLI ì‹¤í–‰ìš© ì§„ì…ì 
def main():
    apply_structure_fixes(dry_run=DRY_RUN)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import os
import json
import shutil
from pathlib import Path
from datetime import datetime

# âœ… ì„¤ì • ê²½ë¡œ
REPORT_PATH = "./memory/reports/structure_report.json"
BACKUP_ROOT = "./memory/structure_fixes_backup"

# âœ… ë¦¬í¬íŠ¸ ë¡œë“œ
def load_structure_report(path: str):
    if not os.path.exists(path):
        raise FileNotFoundError(f"âŒ ë¦¬í¬íŠ¸ íŒŒì¼ ì—†ìŒ: {path}")
    with open(path, "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
        return json.load(f)

# âœ… ë°±ì—… ê²½ë¡œ ê³„ì‚°
def backup_path_for(file_path: str) -> str:
    timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
    rel_path = Path(file_path).relative_to("/home/duksan/ë°”íƒ•í™”ë©´/gumgang_0_5")
    return os.path.join(BACKUP_ROOT, timestamp, str(rel_path))

# âœ… ë°±ì—… ìˆ˜í–‰
def move_to_backup(file_path: str):
    dest = backup_path_for(file_path)
    os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(dest), exist_ok=True)
    shutil.move(file_path, dest)
    return dest

# âœ… ì¤‘ë³µ íŒŒì¼ ì •ë¦¬
def apply_duplicate_file_fixes(duplicates: list, dry_run: bool) -> list:
    results = []
    print("\nğŸ“ ì¤‘ë³µ íŒŒì¼ ì •ë¦¬ ì‹œì‘...")
    for file_entry in duplicates:
        for filename, paths in file_entry.items():
            keep = paths[0]
            item_result = {
                "filename": filename,
                "kept": keep,
                "removed": [],
                "skipped": []
            }
            for dup in paths[1:]:
                if not os.path.exists(dup):
                    print(f"  âš ï¸ ê²½ë¡œ ì—†ìŒ (ìŠ¤í‚µ): {dup}")
                    item_result["skipped"].append(dup)
                    continue
                if dry_run:
                    print(f"  [DRY-RUN] ë°±ì—… ì˜ˆì •: {dup}")
                else:
                    backup = move_to_backup(dup)
                    print(f"  âœ… ì´ë™ ì™„ë£Œ â†’ {backup}")
                item_result["removed"].append(dup)
            results.append(item_result)
    return results

# âœ… ì—°ê²° ì•ˆ ëœ íŒŒì¼ ì •ë¦¬
def apply_unlinked_file_fixes(unlinked: list, dry_run: bool) -> list:
    results = []
    print("\nğŸ“ ì—°ê²°ë˜ì§€ ì•Šì€ íŒŒì¼ ì •ë¦¬ ì‹œì‘...")
    for file_entry in unlinked:
        for filename, paths in file_entry.items():
            for path in paths:
                if not os.path.exists(path):
                    print(f"  âš ï¸ ê²½ë¡œ ì—†ìŒ (ìŠ¤í‚µ): {path}")
                    continue
                dest = os.path.join(UNLINKED_DIR, filename)
                if dry_run:
                    print(f"  [DRY-RUN] ì´ë™ ì˜ˆì •: {path} â†’ {dest}")
                else:
                    os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(dest), exist_ok=True)
                    shutil.move(path, dest)
                    print(f"  âœ… ì´ë™ ì™„ë£Œ: {path} â†’ {dest}")
                results.append({"source": path, "dest": dest})
    return results

# âœ… ë°±ì—”ë“œ-í”„ë¡ íŠ¸ ë¯¸ì—°ê²° ê²½ê³ 
def warn_only_backend_frontend_mismatch(warnings: list):
    print("\nâš ï¸ ë°±ì—”ë“œ-í”„ë¡ íŠ¸ ë¯¸ì—°ê²° í•­ëª©:")
    for msg in warnings:
        print("  -", msg)
    return warnings

# âœ… FastAPIì—ì„œ í˜¸ì¶œ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ í•¨ìˆ˜
def apply_structure_fixes(dry_run: bool = False) -> dict:
    report = load_structure_report(REPORT_PATH)

    dup_result = apply_duplicate_file_fixes(report.get("duplicate_files", []), dry_run)

    warnings = warn_only_backend_frontend_mismatch(report.get("backend_frontend_mismatch", []))

    print("\nğŸ êµ¬ì¡° ìë™ ì •ë¦¬ ì™„ë£Œ.")

        "status": "success",
        "message": "êµ¬ì¡° ìë™ ì •ë¦¬ ì™„ë£Œ",
        "dry_run": dry_run,

        "unlinked_fix_result": unlinked_result,
        "warnings": warnings
    }

# âœ… CLI ì‹¤í–‰ìš© ì§„ì…ì 
def main():
    apply_structure_fixes(dry_run=DRY_RUN)

if __name__ == "__main__":
